about.description:
The fairlearn project seeks to enable anyone involved in the development of
artificial intelligence (AI) systems to assess their system's fairness and
mitigate the observed unfairness.
about.summary: Simple and easy fairness assessment and unfairness mitigation

about.description:
The fairlearn project seeks to enable anyone involved in the development of
artificial intelligence (AI) systems to assess their system's fairness and
mitigate the observed unfairness.
about.summary: Simple and easy fairness assessment and unfairness mitigation

name: fairlearn
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.9.0" %}

package:
  name: fairlearn
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/fairlearn/fairlearn/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 18a434a32a26317af60e62577da5560daa3eefec1d21f497a25b8285dbf98d88

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.5
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.5

test:
  imports:
    - fairlearn

about:
  home: https://github.com/fairlearn/fairlearn
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Simple and easy fairness assessment and unfairness mitigation

  description: |
    The fairlearn project seeks to enable anyone involved in the development of
    artificial intelligence (AI) systems to assess their system's fairness and
    mitigate the observed unfairness.
  doc_url: https://fairlearn.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/fairlearn/fairlearn

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - romanlutz
    - riedgar-ms
    - adrinjalali
